title: Ticket #5952: condor_submit -prepend - helpful given "include command" capability
description:
If an "include:" or "include command:" directive uses any macros in its arguments list, then the "-append" command line option will not influence the operation of that include since those lines are added immediately before the "queue" command, after the include has already been evaluated. By offering a "-prepend" command line option, macros used by includes can take on the desired values.

It may be necessary to make prepended macros immutable, so that a later entry in the submit description doesn't override what was supplied on the command line.
